channel.title: Help with a bug i have plz!
channel.description:
i just did this tutorial here is the link http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484089.0.html
after completing the tut i got these errors can anyone tell me why and help me?
client.java:110: ';' expected public int DCdown = 0;Now search: ^ client.java:134: illegal start of expression public boolean DCDamg = false; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Any help would be much appreciated ty
dont worry about the first bug thats not problem it more the illegal start of expression that gets me
